page.title: ServerlessDays Cardiff - Emily Shea
page.description:
Emily is passionate about serverless technology providing a great entry point for anyone to learn about application development and cloud computing. She is also a self-taught serverless application developer, speaking at multiple AWS re:Invent conferences on her experiences learning serverless. 
 Emily has spent over six years at Amazon building go-to-market strategies for AWS Serverless and Application Integration services

speaker.name: Emily Shea
speaker.title: Head of Serverless Go-to-Market, AWS
